= Processing pre-recorded data =

Using the data logging functionality built into ROS, logfiles can be processed. A tutorial on how to do this is available on ros.org: [http://www.ros.org/wiki/hector_slam/Tutorials/MappingUsingLoggedData How to build a Map Using Logged Data]

= Processing live data =
 
To process live data, a source of [http://www.ros.org/doc/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/LaserScan.html sensor_msgs/LaserScan] messages (for example a Hokuyo LIDAR) and a [http://ros.org/wiki/tf tf-based] transform between the laser and a robot base frame has to be available. There also is a tutorial on [http://www.ros.org/wiki/hector_slam/Tutorials/SettingUpForYourRobot How to set up hector_slam for your robot] on ros.org.
